Flutter Infinite ListView

ListView with items that can be scrolled infinitely in both directions.

Quick Usage

Replace your existing ListView with InfiniteListView. Builder pattern must be used because of its infinite nature.

Example

Bugs/Requests

If you encounter any problems feel free to open an issue. If you feel the library is missing a feature, please raise a ticket on Github and Iâ€™ll look into it. Pull Request are also welcome.
